title: The Pinball Arcade v1.22.7 [VIPER666]
description:
--===VIPER666===--

Version 1.22.7 + DLCs (includes season 3)

[All credits go to MerolaC & machine4578 for supplying & cracking]

1. Mount/Extract ISO and install (don't copy the crack from the ISO)
2. Copy "TPA - v1.21.3 to v1.22.7.exe" into the game folder.
3. Run "TPA - v1.21.3 to v1.22.7.exe" (as Admin IF needed) and click "YES"
4. Wait for the patcher to finish (it takes a while)
5. Copy the contents from "v1.22.7 - Crack" to the game folder.
6. Enjoy.

--===VIPER666===--
